item.title: Remote Development using SSH
item.description: If you need to edit and debug on a remote machine with VS Code, Install Visual Studio Code Remote - SSH extension which helps connect to a remote running SSH server and take full advantage of VS Code’s feature set. Prerequisites: To get started, you need to have done the following steps: Install an OpenSSH compatible SSH client (PuTTY is not supported). Details of remote host machine with pre installed home-creators, SSH username and private Key.
